repair.repairedDockerfile:
FROM golang:alpine

RUN apk add --no-cache --update git make

WORKDIR /src/certgraph
ADD . .

ENV CGO_ENABLED=0
RUN make install

ENTRYPOINT [ "certgraph" ]
